ERRORS.unreachable: Anonymous GitHub is unreachable, contact the admin.
ERRORS.request_error: Unable to download the file, check your connection or contact the admin.
ERRORS.repo_not_accessible: Anonymous GitHub is unable to or is forbidden to access the repository.
ERRORS.repository_not_ready: Anonymous GitHub is still processing the repository, it can take several minutes.
ERRORS.repo_is_updating: Anonymous GitHub is still processing the repository, it can take several minutes.
ERRORS.repoUrl_not_defined: The repository url needs to be defined.
ERRORS.repoId_already_used: The repository id is already used.
ERRORS.invalid_repoId: The format of the repository id is invalid.
ERRORS.branch_not_found: The branch of the repository cannot be found.
ERRORS.invalid_terms_format: Terms are in an invalid format.
ERRORS.unable_to_anonymize: An error happened during the anonymization process. Please try later or report the issue.
ERRORS.non_supported_mode: The selected anonymization mode is invalid, only download and stream are supported.
ERRORS.invalid_path: The provided path is invalid or missing.
ERRORS.file_not_found: The requested file is not found.
ERRORS.file_not_accessible: The requested file is not accessible.
ERRORS.file_not_supported: The file type is not supported. Anonymous GitHub cannot handle it.
ERRORS.file_too_big: The file size exceed the limit of Anonymous GitHub.
ERRORS.is_folder: The path points to a folder.
ERRORS.folder_not_supported: The path points to a folder. Please select a file.
ERRORS.unable_to_write_file: Unable to write file on disk.
ERRORS.stats_unsupported: Statistics are only supported in download mode.
ERRORS.branches_not_found: The requested branch is not found.
ERRORS.readme_not_available: No readme for the repository is found.
ERRORS.user_not_found: The current user is not found in the database
ERRORS.page_not_supported_on_different_branch: Anonymized GitHub pages are only supported on the same branch.
ERRORS.page_not_activated: Anonymized GitHub page is not enabled.
